articles.description: CAMILLA, Duchess of Cornwall, could clinch a higher honour than previously thought when her husband, Prince Charles, ascends the throne, according to a royal biographer.

articles.author: Josh Salisbury
articles.title: BBC newsreader George Alagiah says cancer ‘will probably get me in the end’ - Evening Standard
articles.description: BBC newsreader George Alagiah has revealed how his cancer diagnosis brought him closer to his wife, saying his marriage had become more intimate since.
articles.content:

articles.title: Meghan and Harry 'keeping diaries free' to return to UK for Queen's Jubilee, says expert - The Mirror
articles.description: Royal commentator Neil Sean says the Duke and Duchess of Sussex are set for a return to the UK this year for the Queen's Jubilee celebrations from June 2 to June 5
articles.content:
Meghan Markle and Prince Harry are 'keeping their diaries free' and may be invited to a special banquet with the Queen to celebrate her Platinum Jubilee, a royal expert claims.
